q: You can't get so hung up on where you'd rather be, that you forget to make the most of where you are.
If you aim at nothing, you hit nothing.
a: Shang-Chi and The Legend of The Ten Rings (movie)

q: Enjoy the little things.
When you change your thoughts, remember to also change your world.
People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.
Just one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.
Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Don't watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says  - I'm possible!
You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
We are not our best intentions. We are what we do.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
